title: Better to be in our position than Liverpool's, says Man City's Silva
description: Manchester City midfielder Bernardo Silva says his side are "still in a better position" than title rivals Liverpool.

title: Australian Smith holds off England's Casey to win Players Championship and $3.6m
description: Cameron Smith claims the biggest win of his career as a Players Championship that featured storm delays and near freezing temperatures concludes in warm sunshine in Florida.

title: War in Ukraine: What happened on day 19 of Russia's invasion
description: Drone footage shows destruction of Mariupol, and protesters target an oligarch's London mansion.

title: Ukraine war: Pub dedicated to Hemingway destroyed in Kharkiv
description: The Old Hem pub in Kharkiv was a well-known hangout for young poets and musicians.

title: Roman Abramovich: New evidence highlights corrupt deals
description: BBC Panorama uncovers new evidence on the corrupt deals that helped Chelsea's owner make his fortune.

title: Baftas 2022: Encanto director takes glasses campaigner to London ceremony
description: 12-year-old Lowri was invited to the Baftas after asking Disney to portray more characters in glasses.

title: Ukraine war: Drone shots show Mariupol devastated by fighting
description: Thousands of civilians have been trapped in the Ukrainian port city for nearly two weeks

title: Mass graves in Ukraine: Battered cities are digging makeshift burial sites
description: Street cleaners are collecting bodies as besieged locals resort to burying civilians in trenches.

title: Inflation: Sports bras in, doughnuts out of cost of living measure
description: Pet collars and frozen Yorkshire puddings are other goods now used to measure changes in the cost of living.

title: Petrol prices set to ease after hitting record highs
description: Fuel prices are expected to peak this week before falling due to the price of oil dropping globally.

title: Cost of living: Food boss says prices could rise by up to 15%
description: The boss of food firm 2 Sisters warns prices will jump as a result of the war in Ukraine.

title: Ukraine war: Pregnant woman and baby die after hospital shelled
description: The woman, seen in a widely shared image being carried out of the maternity hospital, dies along with her baby.

title: Cancer: 'I thought I had Covid but it was terminal lung cancer'
description: Doctors call for targeted lung cancer screening to catch cases early and reduce deaths by 20%.

title: Ukraine: Squatters occupy Russian oligarch's London mansion
description: Squatters have draped Ukrainian flags over the property believed to be owned by Oleg Deripaska.

title: Ukraine war: 'No cap' on refugees under new UK visa scheme
description: It is hoped tens of thousands of displaced people will benefit from the plan, the government says.

title: Women's World Cup: England suffer another defeat as South Africa's Kapp takes five wickets
description: England's hopes of defending the Women's World Cup are hanging by a thread after an agonising three-wicket defeat by South Africa in Mount Maunganui.

title: Ukraine war: 21 children flown to UK for cancer treatment
description: The children and their families arrived on an urgent flight after a plea from Polish officials.

title: Ukraine crisis: US warns China against helping Russia
description: US officials say Russia asked China for military support and help in evading sanctions.

title: Tom Brady: NFL great makes retirement U-turn after six weeks
description: Tom Brady, one of the greatest players in NFL history, is coming back for his 23rd season only six weeks after retiring.

title: Rolling Stones announce first UK dates since Charlie Watts' death
description: The band will play in Liverpool and London as part of their 60th anniversary European tour.

description: England's hopes of defending the Women's World Cup are hanging by a thread after an agonising three-wicket defeat by South Africa.

title: WATCH: Residents rescued after Kyiv apartment block strike
description: At least one person was killed when the residential building in the Ukrainian capital was hit.

title: The Muslim women learning to ride a bike in their 40s
description: Hijabi riders is introducing cycling to Muslim women who never learned to ride a bike as a child.

title: Behind the scenes on the nearly-ready Crossrail project
description: The safety exercises on Crossrail are entering their final stages, meaning it could open in months.

title: Newspaper headlines: 'War at Nato's door' as Putin has 'West in sights'
description: Russia's missile strike on a military base in the west of Ukraine carried a warning, Monday's papers suggest.

title: Hong Kong: Briton accused of jeopardising China's security
description: Human rights activist is threatened with jail for "collusion with foreign forces" over Hong Kong campaign.

title: Women's World Cup: Watch bizarre Nat Sciver dismissal for England against South Africa
description: Watch Nat Sciver's bizarre dismissal as the England all-rounder manages to hit it to slip off the back of her bat leaving England 42-3.

title: Baftas 2022: Seven highlights - from the jokes to the dresses

title: William Hurt: Oscar-winning actor and Marvel star dies at 71
description: His roles ranged from acclaimed 1980s dramas to playing General Thaddeus Ross in five Marvel films.

title: Reproductive coercion: 'I wasn't allowed to take my pill'

description: Ways to slow the spread of bad information and false posts from the war.

title: Zhytomyr: Aerial attacks hit city that is corridor to Kyiv
description: Zhytomyr, in north-west Ukraine, is facing intense daily attacks. Why is it being bombed so heavily?

description: People diagnosed with the skin condition rosacea talk about its impact on their mental health.

title: Deep listening: I realised we all share the same human feelings

description: The sport of surfing is modernising, using technology to offer bigger, better and safer thrills.

title: Ukraine war: Five times refugees were met with kindness
